title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7845.1 - Commencement of the energy planning proceeding and establishment of a service list
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7845.1 - Commencement of the energy planning proceeding and establishment of a service list

State Regulations
(a) After the
initial scoping meeting provided for in section
7844.1
of this Title, the chair
shall commence the State Energy Planning proceeding and so notify the public by
posting on the State Energy Plan website and causing to be published in the

State Register a notice of commencement of the planning proceeding. Such notice
shall provide a brief description of the planning proceeding, including the
draft scope, and invite requests from interested persons for inclusion on a
service list to receive documents in the proceeding. Such notice shall also
solicit input on the draft scope and other matters that the public believes
should be addressed by the board in the State Energy Plan. (b) For each planning proceeding, the board
shall establish a service list that includes persons who reside in or conduct
business in the State who make a request in writing to the board's secretary to
be included on the service list. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7845.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
